## Repository.findAll() method

Get all documents without pagination

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findAll({ sort, order }: {
        sort?: string | undefined;
        order?: string | undefined;
    }): Promise<DocumentResult[]>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

## Remarks

To use with caution, because it can be very heavy &amp; expensive
